mainBoard.originalText: Creatures you control get +0/+1 until end of turn. They get an additional +0/+2 until end of turn unless any player pays o2.

rulings.text: Each player (starting with the current player and going in turn order) gets the option to pay when this spell resolves.

mainBoard.name: Seal of Cleansing

rulings.text: Sacrificing Seal of Cleansing is the cost to activate its ability. Once you activate the ability, no player can do anything to Seal of Cleansing to stop you from activating it. Notably, if you cast Seal of Cleansing during your turn, you'll have priority to activate its ability before anyone can respond to stop you.

mainBoard.name: Topple
mainBoard.originalText: Remove target creature with the greatest power from the game. (If two or more creatures are tied for greatest power, target only one of them.)

rulings.text: It can only target a creature with the greatest power. This means you pick such a creature on announcement, and if that creature is not still the one with greatest power on resolution, then this spell doesn’t resolve since its target is illegal.

mainBoard.text: Exile target creature with the greatest power among creatures on the battlefield. (If two or more creatures are tied for greatest power, target any one of them.)

mainBoard.name: Rhystic Study
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever an opponent plays a spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays o1.

rulings.text: Rhystic Study's triggered ability resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. It resolves even if that spell is countered. The player gets the option to pay when this triggered ability resolves.
You don't have to decide whether or not to draw a card until after the player decides whether or not to pay.
